prompts: Create a ghostly sword Pokemon with a blue ribbon and metallic accents.
I want a unique design for a steel-type Pokemon that resembles a weapon.
Generate an eerie ghost-type Pokemon that embodies chivalry and mystery.
Make a Pokemon that combines sword and spirit elements with a mystical aura.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sword body and a waving blue cloth resembling a cape.
Design a ghostly entity that appears as a sword, with an ethereal blue accent.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a haunted sword with a flowing blue ribbon.
